caption: Abraham Bosse (1602–1676; born Tours, France; died Paris, France), Published by Melchoir Tavernier (1594–1665; born Antwerp, Belgium, active and died Paris, France), Le Savetier (The Shoemaker), from the series Les Métiers (The Trades), 1632–33. Etching and engraving; 26.2 × 34 cm. Gift of David L. Chambers, Class of 1962, and John G. Crane (2024-148)
captionhtml: Abraham Bosse (1602–1676; born Tours, France; died Paris, France), Published by Melchoir Tavernier (1594–1665; born Antwerp, Belgium, active and died Paris, France), Le Savetier (The Shoemaker), from the series Les Métiers (The Trades), 1632–33. Etching and engraving; 26.2 × 34 cm. Gift of David L. Chambers, Class of 1962, and John G. Crane (2024-148)
